title: THE LONGEST LOADING SCREEN LIKE HOLY GAWD
body:
Ok, So Right now, Like literally right now, There is a loading screen loading. AND LET ME TELL YOU. IT ALREADY TOOK MORE THAN 20 MINUTES AND I DON'T WANT TO PLAY ANYMORE. What effects the loading screen?

(edited) Ok, I went back to  my PC this morning again after I posted this last night and its still loading

replies.body: Is this happening for any other matches you queue for or was this a one-off issue?
Don't worry, its fixed. It seems if i exit out of lol while loading, it glitches and it won't work just showing a loading screen. it shows it loading. I guess i just have a bad pc. ty
Ok, Now, I looked at op.gg and it said the game played already. I lost the game and It seemed everyone was in the game. WAT?
